newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.006pts to 101.159.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.006pts to 101.159.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds fell 0.006 points in Wednesday's trading to 101.159, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.497 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, fell 0.007 points to 97.402, the bank said, while the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.002 points to 2.272 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 rose 1.109 points to 1,128.555.
